programme.title: Live International Rugby Union
programme.sub-title: New Zealand v France: First Test
programme.desc: New Zealand v France (Kick-off 8.35am). Coverage of the First Test in the three-match series, which takes place at at Eden Park in Auckland. New Zealand have claimed victory in the last 11 meetings between the sides, a run that spans back to 2009. The most recent of those matches was last November, when the All Blacks prevailed 38-18 at the Stade de France.(n)

programme.title: Sport in Focus
programme.desc: Andrea Dovizioso sits down with Suzi Perry to discuss the story of his childhood, his relationship with teammate Jorge Lorenzo and his journey to becoming a MotoGP title contender.(n)

programme.title: Blancpain Endurance Series
programme.desc: Highlights from round five of the Blancpain GT Series Endurance Cup at the Circuit Paul Ricard in France.(n)

programme.title: World Rally Championship
programme.desc: Highlights of day one from Rally Italy, the sixth round of the World Rally Championship.(n)
BT Sport goes behind the scenes with former world heavyweight champion Tyson Fury as he prepares to make his much anticipated return to the ring.(n)
Day one of the NCAA track and field championships at Hayward Field in Eugene.(n)
A look back at the thrilling 2001 World Rally Championship. Flamboyant Colin McRae and the clinical Richard Burns went head-to-head in one of the series' greatest title battles.(n)
A look back at the 2002 World Rally Championship. A star-studded grid including Marcus Gronholm, Richard Burns, Colin McRae and Sebastien Loeb slug it out across 14 rallies.(n)
A look back at the 2003 World Rally Championship. New boy Sebastien Loeb took on the WRC old guard which included Marcus Gronholm, Carlos Sainz, Colin McRae and Tommi Makinen.(n)
We look back at the clash between Hoffenheim and Bayer Leverkusen in a game that brought together two of the Bundesliga's most exciting and attack-minded teams.(n)
We revisit Bayern Munich's clash with Werder Bremen as Robert Lewandowski looked to continue his remarkable record of scoring in every home league game of the season.(n)
We look back at Bayern Munich's clash with Hoffenheim. Bayern Munich will be out for revenge when they meet Hoffenheim having lost the last two Bundesliga clashes between the two.(n)
We look back as Bayern Munich hoped to make it ten Bundesliga wins in a row when they met Wolfsburg at the Volkswagen Arena. Bayern claimed a 6-0 victory in last year's encounter.(n)
We revisit Borussia Dortmund's Bundesliga clash with Eintracht Frankfurt as both teams eyed a Champions League spot. The two shared the spoils in the reverse fixture.(n)
We look back at Borussia Monchengladbach's Bundesliga clash with Hoffenheim. A Hoffenheim win would've lifted them back into the top six for the first time since December.(n)
We revisit Der Klassiker as Bayern Munich hoped to clinch their sixth consecutive Bundesliga title against Borussia Dortmund. Peter Stoger's men had gone 12 league games unbeaten.(n)
We look back at April's dramatic Bundesliga clash between Schalke and Hamburg at the Volksparkstadion. The hosts were looking to register their first league win since November.(n)
We revisit the do-or-die clash between Cologne and Freiburg, with Cologne needing a win to stay in the Bundesliga. Freiburg secured a dramatic 4-3 victory when the two last met.(n)
We revisit the Bundesliga clash between Hertha Berlin and RB Leipzig at the Olympiastadion. Hertha still had hopes of a top four finish providing other results went their way.(n)
Bayern Munich hope to secure the double in Jupp Heynckes' final game as they play Eintracht Frankfurt in the German Cup final. Frankfurt have not beaten Bayern since March 2010.(n)
With the VAR system now in place in the Bundesliga, this fascinating documentary offers a behind-the-scenes look at how the innovation has been implemented on and off the field.(n)

programme.sub-title: Der Klassiker: One Game, So Many Stories

programme.title: Live! NBA finale (3. tekma): Cleveland - Golden State
programme.desc: V ligi NBA nič novega. programme.title: 2. Spanish league: Pregled Rounda

programme.title: Zlata liga (m): Slovenija - Nizozemska

programme.title: Prijateljska tekma: Anglija - Kostarika
programme.desc: Svetovno prvenstvo je tik pred vrati, reprezentance pa na zadnjih prijateljskih obračunih odpravljajo še zadnje pomanjkljivosti. Angleži v Rusijo odhajajo na čelu z novim kapetanom Harryjem Kanom in visokoletečimi cilji, obračun proti neugodni Kostariki pa bo že podal odgovor na marsikatero vprašanje, ki si jih zastavljajo otoški ljubitelji nogometa.

programme.title: Kvalifikacije za EP 2018 (ž): Češka - Slovenija
programme.desc: Najboljše slovenske rokometašice s kvalifikacijami za evropsko prvenstvo nadaljujejo z zahtevnim gostovanjem na Češkem. Bodo Slovenke prišle do zmage in pomembnih točk v boju za preboj na evropsko prvenstvo? Izbranke Uroša Bregarja za odhod v Francijo potrebujejo drugo mesto v skupini.

programme.title: Live! FIBA 3X3 World Cup 2018 (ž) - Manila: Francija - Argentina
programme.desc: Potem ko je pred letom dni najboljše "ulične" košarkarje gostila Francija, bo letos v vlogi gostitelja svetovnega prvenstva filipinska prestolnica Manila. programme.desc: Alabama (11-1) vs. Clemson (12-1). From Mercedes-Benz Superdome in New Orleans. Coaches Nick Saban and Dabo Swinney meet again after splitting the last two CFP title games. Tackles Raekwon Davis and Christian Wilkins anchor defenses that rank 1-2 in ppg. At QB, Tide sophomore Jalen Hurts has thrown one INT all season and looks to improve on his 13-for-31 night vs. Clemson last year. Tigers junior Kelly Bryant (24 total TDs) operates behind three first-team All-ACC linemen. (cc).

programme.desc: Georgia (12-1) vs. Oklahoma (12-1). From the Rose Bowl in Pasadena, Cal.
